H0.text: As activity increases, more oxygen is exhaled is the reason Ava observed an increased number of breaths per minute during higher levels of physical activity.

H1.text: As activity increases, breathing becomes more efficient is the reason for the increase in the number of breaths per minute that Ava observed when she counted breaths per minute during different activities, noting that the number of breaths rises as physical activity increases.

H2.text: As activity increases, the oxygen needs of cells increase, which explains why Ava observed a higher number of breaths per minute during more intense physical activity.

H3.text: As activity increases, the rate of the heart beating increases, explaining why Ava observed that the number of breaths per minute rises during more intense physical activity.

A4.text: At high levels of physiological exertion (running, climbing, throwing) more rapid gas exchange is necessitated
